content:
respond to this posting: We are looking for an SDR to book appointments for our Fintech/SaaS/Health Care clients via cold calling, email, and social media outreach.

This is a full-time job with 40 hours work week, Monday to Friday, which starts at 9 AM EST up until 6 PM EST.

Required Skills:
-Good Communication skill is a must
-Has experience in appointment setting
-Able to make a high number of calls daily

The following are not required but are a Plus:
-Knowledge of using Salesforce CRM, Excel, and Google Sheets.
-Knowledge in the Fintech, SaaS, or Health Care Space

This is a long-term project with a 30, 60, and 90-day review.
